title: Okay, Blade and Soul has one unforgivable flaw.
body:
You can't change servers without paying for membership. 

Do you want to play with your friends? Nope, gotta create a new character, and start all over.

Just... no. Even the most basic of MMOs allow free server change, if they're halfway decent. IE: AQW

I mean, if you want to have Premium servers, that's all fine and good. I just don't want to invest 20 hours again into this game just so I can catch up to where my group is. 

I mean, that's just bad game design. :c
